column6: As natural phenomena tear the Black Rock Desert apart-with Storm stuck deep in the Earth at the epicenter-the X-Men race to find answers and save their teammate! And while some of the team follow a lead that takes them to the Inhuman Queen MEDUSA, Psylocke makes an EXPLOSIVE discovery of her own...
column8: | artist:Roland Boschi | penciller (cover):Jorge Molina | writer:G. Willow Wilson
